enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to the composite collection, making them closely related in terms of state change.
addAll method also involves adding elements to the composite collection, making it functionally similar to the add method.
The add method requires a CollectionMutator to be set, indicating that setMutator should be invoked before add to ensure proper state.
The remove method may need to be invoked after add to test the removal of elements added by the add method.
